channel.title: Posts on Idle Vapourings
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Idle Vapourings

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Greetings earthlings, welcome to my blog. Background: This is the culmination of multiple weeks of procrastinating, bikeshedding, and toying with the idea of implementing my own blog-oriented SSG and ultimately giving up once I recalled hugo exists. What sort of content should I expect? I don’t have any plans in particular about the type of content I will post on here, other than it being within the bounds of STEM (unless my mind decides to wander elsewhere, which it tends to do).
